channel.title: I need help badly about CFG files errors cant compile
channel.description:
ok when i add a shop always when i try to run server it says that its a error on it is this a error on my own shop
it is my general shop where i can put stuff on it and sell it shop = 39 Kevins Own Shop 1 1
and also when i add something in autospawn or something else i to get error on that are they like locked to not change anything can i plz get help here is the error i always get for every shop i change or add (error form that shop)::: [code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: for input string: "39 Kevins Own Shop 1 1" at java.lang.NumberFormatException. for InputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:115) at ShopHandler.(init)(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:30) [/code] anyone knows how to fix it i hate that i can not edit my CFG Files it should not be any wrong with it
so plz someone help me
I USE Source Project 16

item.title: I need help badly about CFG files errors cant compile

item.description:
@aronscape wrote:

at kevins own shop make sure u have pressed TAB then 1 Again tab then 1.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help badly about CFG files errors cant compile
item.dc:creator: @kevin5475845 kevin5475845
item.description:
@kevin5475845 wrote:

ok when i add a shop always when i try to run server it says that its a error on it is this a error on my own shop

it is my general shop where i can put stuff on it and sell it
shop = 39 Kevins Own Shop 1 1

and also when i add something in autospawn or something else i to get error on that are they like locked to not change anything
can i plz get help
here is the error i always get for every shop i change or add (error form that shop):::

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: for input string: "39
Kevins Own Shop                                 1       1"
at java.lang.NumberFormatException. for InputString(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:115)
at ShopHandler.(init)(ShopHandler.java:30)
at server.main(server.java:30)

anyone knows how to fix it i hate that i can not edit my CFG Files it should
not be any wrong with it

so plz someone help me

I USE Source Project 16

Read full topic
